description:
The ultimate cross-platform tagger for DJs

Cross-platform music tagger. It can fetch metadata from Beatport, Traxsource, Juno Download, Discogs, Musicbrainz and Spotify. It is also able to fetch Spotify's Audio Features based on ISRC & exact match. There is a manual tag editor and quick tag editor which lets you use keyboard shortcuts. Written in Rust, Vue.js and Quasar. MP3, AIFF, FLAC, M4A (AAC, ALAC) supported. For more info and tutorials check out our website.
1.7.0
(03.08.2023)Auto Tag:
- Updated Beatport to support the new site
- Improved match rates
- Selectable overwrite
- Internal refactor to how tags work
- Explicit tag
- BPMSupreme > Latino
Quick Tag:
- Multiple files mode
- Thin view mode
- External player support
Renamer:
- Fixed input updating
- BPM in MP4
Other:
- Various bug fixes and improvements in all sections
